info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 11 at 3:37PM EDT until July 12 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves will build to between 3 and 5 feet Tuesday morning, diminishing to 1 to 3 feet by late in the afternoon. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte county. In Michigan, Berrien county. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
